description: Due to bug 1386232 Nova forked get_volume_api_from_url method from python-cinderclient. As the bug is fixed now we should switch back to using cinderclient's version.
title: Nova forks python-cinderclient's get_volume_api_from_url

commit 6b5733803336eda074b4eafc7fa91ccd49f7cc02
Author: Michal Dulko <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jun 16 15:17:54 2015 +0200

    Replace get_cinder_client_version in cinder.py
    
    Due to bug 1386232 Nova has forked get_volume_api_from_url method from
    python-cinderclient. As the bug is fixed now this commit removes Nova's
    version and replaces usages with cinderclient's one.
    
    Depends-On: Idce26be00db8551d265fe668975a5843c772dd65
